means: 营救，救援，使免遭损失( rescue的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: He was rescued only when an exhausted friend swam ashore.
sentence.Network_cn: 当一个精疲力尽的友人游上岸后他才获救。

sentence.Network_en: Other party-goers rescued the injured man from his assailant.
sentence.Network_cn: 其他参加聚会的人把这名伤者从行凶者手中救了出来。

sentence.Network_en: Helicopters rescued nearly 20 people from the roof of the burning building.
sentence.Network_cn: 直升机从失火大楼的楼顶救出了将近20人。

entry.def: If you rescue someone, you get them out of a dangerous or unpleasant situation.

example.ex: Helicopters rescued nearly 20 people from the roof of the burning building...
example.tran: 直升机从失火大楼的楼顶救出了将近20人。

example.ex: He had rescued her from a horrible life.
example.tran: 他把她从可怕的生活中解救了出来。

entry.def: Rescue is help which gets someone out of a dangerous or unpleasant situation.

example.ex: Lights clipped onto life jackets improve the chances of rescue...
example.tran: 别在救生衣上的灯提高了获救可能性。

example.ex: A big rescue operation has been launched for a trawler missing in the English Channel.
example.tran: 为寻找在英吉利海峡失踪的一艘拖网渔船，人们展开了一场大规模的搜救行动。

entry.tran: 营救行动;救援行动;救助行为
entry.def: A rescue is an attempt to save someone from a dangerous or unpleasant situation.

example.ex: A major air-sea rescue is under way...
example.tran: 一场大规模的海空营救行动正在进行。

example.ex: Five children were pulled from the smoke-filled house in heroic rescues by fire crews.
example.tran: 在消防人员英勇的营救行动中，有5个孩子从浓烟弥漫的房子里被救出。

entry.def: If you go to someone's rescue or come to their rescue, you help them when they are in danger or difficulty.

example.ex: The 23-year-old's screams alerted a passerby who went to her rescue...
example.tran: 那个23岁女孩的尖叫引来了一位过路人前去营救。

example.ex: The crisis puts strong political pressure on the state government to come to the rescue.
example.tran: 这次危机给前来救助的州政府带来了巨大的政治压力。

auth_sentence.content: This woman was rescued a day after the collapse.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: This woman was rescued a day after the collapse.

auth_sentence.res_content: She...rescued other women from the tyranny of the corset.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She...rescued other women from the tyranny of the corset.

auth_sentence.content: But fortunately we were rescued by the Italian navy.
auth_sentence.res_content: But fortunately we were rescued by the Italian navy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But fortunately we were rescued by the Italian navy.

Sentence.sentence: For example, several months after listening to an informative speech, Pete Gentry in North Carolina rescued his brother who is choking on food, by using the method taught by student speaker, Julie Paris.
He rescued a student from a big fire
